UI_visible_response: The adjustment of the composition of the State Council is a decision made in line with the overall situation of the country's development and the needs of work, aiming to better promote the country's various undertakings.Each adjustment and appointment of cadres is to adapt to the development situation and tasks, and to ensure the high - quality implementation of national governance and various undertakings. We should view these matters from a macro - perspective and a rational attitude, and have full confidence in the country's development and the work of the government.
